title: Dubai Ruler Ordered to Pay More Than $728 Million in Divorce Settlement
content:
1. Dubai Ruler Ordered to Pay More Than $728 Million in Divorce Settlement  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Dubai ruler Sheikh Mohammed must pay record-breaking £500m divorce settlement to Princess Haya  BBC News
  3. Princess Paid Bodyguard $9M in Blackmail to Keep Their Affair Quiet, but Still Got Busted  The Daily Beast
  4. Dubai sheikh ordered to fund ex-wife's $700M protection from himself  Fox News
  5. Court orders Dubai ruler to pay ex-wife $728m -- one of the UK's largest ever divorce settlements  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
